webcam.name: Webcam
webcam.error: Failed to access webcam! Please allow the use of your webcam! Also for your browser!

home.tagline: Push your stress - Push your mind

footer.names: A. Aravindan, A. Ohlmann, C. Perez, J. Schüll, T. Vogel and M. Nissen, M. Zürl

testName.title: Test name
testName.text: The test is going to be saved, as well as displayed on the management page under this name.

toolbar.title: Toolbar
toolbar.text: Inside the toolbar all available screens or overlays are listed. The stress pipelines can be created by dragging and dropping items fro the toolbar to the pipeline.

screens.title: Screens
screens.text: Each screen will be displayed fullscreen inside the uses browsers. There are different types of screen available in the toolbar. Each screen has its own settings, which can be adjusted inside the pipeline.

overlays.title: Overlays
overlays.text: Overlays are displayed on top of the current screen. All overlays are displayed simultaneously during the whole stress pipeline execution, therefore they do not have an order. Each overlay has its own settings, which can be adjusted inside the pipeline

pipeline.title: Pipeline
pipeline.text: The stress pipeline consists of a list of screens that will be displayed successively to the patient. It  can be equipped with overlays that are displayed on top of the current screen. To create it you have to drag an item from the toolbar and drop it into the pipeline. Within each item inside a pipeline the user can adjust the settings of the current item.

save.title: Save settings
save.text: If the pipelines are well arranged, this button will save all of your settings. Later on, all the saved tests can be found on the management page

participantID.title: Add participant ID
participantID.text: In this text input, the ID, name, number, etc. of the subject/participant can be written.

link.title: Copy test link
link.text: To use the stress pipeline a link, that contains all information, can be generated. When opening the link, the pipeline Executor will run the stress pipeline.

download.title: Get records for this test
download.text: To download all statistics about the perfomance of the user during the stress test you have to click the download button.
